function.name: cooking_getStatus
function.description: This function is used to get the current status of cooking on a cooking appliance.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking status is being checked.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking status is being checked.

groupAction.description: The group action related to the devices.
